ValidationRule.description: Validates that the ContactFax field contains only valid phone number characters and has a minimum length
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(ContactFax)), OR( LEN(ContactFax) < 7, LEN(ContactFax) > 40, NOT(REGEX(ContactFax, "^[0-9\\s\\-\\(\\)\\+\\.]+$")) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Contact fax number must be between 7 and 40 characters and contain only digits, spaces, hyphens, parentheses, plus signs, or periods.
